articles.description: Ferrari Formula 1 boss Mattia Binotto continues to downplay the Italian team’s 2022 prospects despite another successful test in Bahrain.
articles.content: The F1-75 has been consistently fast in all conditions over the six days of testing in Barcelona and Sakhir, although Red Bull clearly made a significant step with the new aero package it introduced … [+2693 chars]
